page.title: 08My Dad's Allotment.
page.content: My dad is a keen gardener.He has got an allotment at Weston.His plot is 10 rods and it costs him Â£15 rent each year from Southampton City Council. He works on his plot about three times a week usualy at week-ends and he said it's realy hard work keeping it going,that's probably why so many of the{plots are vacant.}Also the rent has gone up a lot in the last few years so that has put many people off. There are taps for water all round the site but you have to share with others.By the main gate there are toilets and a shop for those in the Gardening Club to buy things cheaply. My dad grows pots,R.beans,B.beans, cabbage,lettuce,rhubarb,beetroot, strawberry,raddish,cauliflower,carrots but he doesn't think it saves him money but he must enjoy it because he works so hard.
